summary: Provides a collection of utility functions that translate Cython types, expressions, and indexing patterns into Pythran-compatible representations, determine support for NumPy operations, and generate necessary include directives and code snippets for integrating Pythran-accelerated routines within Cython modules.
business_intent: Facilitate the use of Pythranâ€™s high-performance numeric compilation within Cython projects, allowing developers to offload supported NumPy-based computations to Pythran while handling type conversion and code emission automatically.
